00035 #ifndef MsqFreeVertexIndexIterator_hpp
00036 #define MsqFreeVertexIndexIterator_hpp
00037 
00038 #include <cstddef>
00039 #include <cstdlib>
00040 
00041 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00042 #include "MsqVertex.hpp"
00043 #include "PatchData.hpp"
00044 #include "MsqVertex.hpp"
00045 
00046 namespace MESQUITE_NS
00047 {
00048   class MsqError;
00049 
00062   class MsqFreeVertexIndexIterator {
00063   public:
00064     MsqFreeVertexIndexIterator(const PatchData& pd, MsqError &err) :
00065       iterOriginator(pd), iterCurrentIndex((size_t)-1)
00066       {}
00069     void reset() { iterCurrentIndex=(size_t)-1; }
00071     inline bool next();
00073     std::size_t value() {return iterCurrentIndex;}
00074   private:
00075     const PatchData& iterOriginator;
00076     std::size_t iterCurrentIndex;
00077   };
00078   
00079 
00085   inline bool MsqFreeVertexIndexIterator::next()
00086   {
00087     ++iterCurrentIndex;
00088     while (iterCurrentIndex < iterOriginator.num_free_vertices())
00089     {
00090       if (!iterOriginator.vertex_by_index(iterCurrentIndex).is_flag_set(MsqVertex::MSQ_CULLED))
00091         return true;
00092       ++iterCurrentIndex;
00093     }
00094     return false;
00095   }
00096
